Description: Automatically kick players based on a local or remote blacklist.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Kick automatically
CheckboxSettings.Description: Immediately kick blacklisted players that join when you are host.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Leave automatically
CheckboxSettings.Description: Leave the game if a blacklisted player joins.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Verbose mode
CheckboxSettings.Description: Print more messages about what the mod is doing. Useful for testing.

DropdownSettings.Name: Send warnings
DropdownSettings.Description: Disable giving warnings in redundant scenarios, like in official modes or when you are not host.
